translation.Name: Belgium Note - Afzetters Cave #2
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_0: The crisis in Belgium is growing at an extreme rate. There isn’t enough food, water or medicine to support the remainder of survivors in Belgium.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: We are losing the vital aid and support that Belgium desperately needs.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_4: I have a classified offer that is to be shared with no other person including military personnel. To ensure the survival of the human race we have to cut down on the population.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_5: I’m asking that your organization to reduce the population of Belgium (mainly the infected) to ensure the survival of the rest of the species.
